alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Laurens; Pulaski; Telfair; Wheeler; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 2:15PM EDT until April 01 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Laurens County in central Georgia... Dodge County in central Georgia... Southeastern Pulaski County in central Georgia... Telfair County in central Georgia... Wilcox County in central Georgia... Wheeler County in central Georgia... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 215 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Plainfield to near Pitts, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... McRae, Eastman, Abbeville, Alamo, Helena, Lumber City, Rochelle, Glenwood, Milan, Rhine, Scotland, Chauncey, Pitts, Jacksonville, Union, Towns, Horse Creek Wma, Spring Hill, Plainfield and Cedar Grove. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.

area.areaDesc: Dodge; Laurens; Pulaski; Telfair; Wheeler; Wilcox
